title: Future / Sci-Fi Music Pack - Volume 1
description: A pack of 42 tracks of futuristic/Sci-fi audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything futuristic from puzzles to shooters.


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The Future/Sci-Fi Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is a largely electronic pack of tracks written for any project with a futuristic feel. Includes full tracks perfect for menus and in-game action plus short loops for adaptability.


FUTURE/SCI-FI MUSIC PACK - Overview

- SEVEN full tracks of beaty, percussive and energetic vibes : LISTEN HERE

- SEVEN full tracks of ambient, gentle and mellow feels: LISTEN HERE
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

- TWENTY EIGHT accompanying shorter loops, produced to loop seamlessly

- Fully Mastered tracks ready for import

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre


Number of Audio Wavs: 42

Number of Audio Cues: 42

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 43:03

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
